Title: Requires containerized waste systems for certain residential buildings with more than one hundred fifty units
Summary: Requires containerized waste systems for certain residential buildings with more than one hundred fifty units; defines "containerized waste system" as a waste management system that utilizes sealed containers with dimensions of up to eight feet in width, five feet in height and twenty feet in length.
LawCode: Add ยง27-2021.1, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring containerized waste systems for certain residential buildings with more than one hundred fifty units
